original_solution_mapping.L1: When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
original_solution_mapping.L2: When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=110>>110 seashells
original_solution_mapping.L3: He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*110 = <<55=55>>55 seashells

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 130.
    Returns: the number of seashells Ali had left.
    """
    # L1
    initial_seashells = 180 # He started with 180 seashells
    given_to_friends = 40 # gave away 40 seashells to his friends
    seashells_after_friends = initial_seashells - given_to_friends

    # L2
    given_to_brothers = 30 # gave 30 seashells to his brothers
    seashells_after_brothers = seashells_after_friends - given_to_brothers

    # L3
    sold_fraction = Fraction(1, 2) # sold half of the remaining seashells
    seashells_sold = sold_fraction * seashells_after_brothers

    # L4
    seashells_left = seashells_after_brothers - seashells_sold

    # FA
    answer = seashells_left
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: When he gave {given_to_friends} seashells to his friends, Ali had {initial_seashells}-{given_to_friends}= <<{initial_seashells}-{given_to_friends}={seashells_after_friends}>>{seashells_after_friends} seashells.

When he gave another {given_to_brothers} seashells to his brothers, he had {seashells_after_friends}-{given_to_brothers} = <<{seashells_after_friends}-{given_to_brothers}={seashells_after_brothers}>>{seashells_after_brothers} seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of {sold_fraction}*{seashells_after_brothers} = <<{sold_fraction}*{seashells_after_brothers}={seashells_sold}>>{seashells_sold} seashells

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=110>>110 seashells
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*110 = <<1/2*110=55>>55 seashells

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'seashells_after_friends' (value: 140) was used instead of 'seashells_after_brothers' (value: 110).
